package.name: HarlemShake Reborn
package.shortDescription: You probably thought the Harlem Shake was over, didn't you?

changelog.change: This tweak brings the iconic Harlem Shake meme back to life – with a twist. Icons on your screen flip, spin, and dance wildly to the legendary tune, just like it’s 2013 all over again. Inspired by the viral craze, this app adds a touch of chaos and fun to your UI. Perfect for nostalgic vibes, party demos, or just confusing your friends.
